entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow this morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Thursday 30 March 2023
